Question: Head Sun Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Head Sun Co., Ltd.

Product Highlight at CES 2024

- 4K, 29.5-Inch LCD Display: Offers unparalleled clarity and visual immersion, setting a new standard for excellence in the industry.

- Customizable Touch Panels: Each showcased LCD display comes with customizable touch panels, providing a seamless interactive experience tailored to unique needs.
